armies.name: chaos daemons
armies.description: Malevolent entities from the Warp, embodying the dark desires of their gods.

armies.name: chaos knights
armies.description: Corrupted knights that bring death and destruction in the name of Chaos.

armies.name: chaos space marines
armies.description: Traitor marines who turned from the Emperor to serve the dark gods.

armies.name: death guard
armies.description: The plague-ridden followers of Nurgle, spreading disease and decay.

armies.name: thousand sons
armies.description: The sorcerous legions of Tzeentch, wielding powerful psychic abilities.

armies.name: world eaters
armies.description: The bloodthirsty berserkers devoted to Khorne, reveling in slaughter.
